moved_yaml.description:
Configuring Wake on Lan using YAML has been moved to integration key.

Your existing YAML configuration will be working for 2 more versions.

Migrate your YAML configuration to the integration key according to the documentation.
moved_yaml.title: The Wake on Lan YAML configuration has been moved

send_magic_packet.description: Sends a 'magic packet' to wake up a device with 'Wake-On-LAN' capabilities.

broadcast_address.description: Broadcast IP where to send the magic packet.
broadcast_address.name: Broadcast address

broadcast_port.description: Port where to send the magic packet.
broadcast_port.name: Broadcast port

mac.description: MAC address of the device to wake up.
mac.name: MAC address

send_magic_packet.name: Send magic packet
